p: The CC 50s and EC 50s of drugs were determined by a best-fit Log(dose)-response curve-fitting in GraphPad Prism 7. One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) and Dunnettâ€™s multiple comparisons test were used to analyze data. Statistical significances are denoted as follows; * p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.005; **** p < 0.001.
